name: Survive Phantom Estate
description:
Tactical boardgame for original Playstation 1 hardware. Escape the spooky mansion by completing the map’s objectives before your team are killed by the ghouls and ghosts.

Developed for Ludum Dare 49. The current Jam version is playable but I am still working on the game to add more features to make it a more interesting game.

Note for LD Playtesters: Could I aks you NOT to review/vote on the game. I just took part in the jam for my own enjoyment. I prefer game development not to be competitive.
